channel.title: Help

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:4, topic:435824”][quote author=erblin link=topic=538546.msg3940373#msg3940373 date=1331383474]

Remove the try part of the command.

? how ;A
[/quote]

Can you at least try to put more effort into your posts. I’m tired of people typing like “heeeyyy u guyz help me i need gud sever so cn u help me plzzzzz”.

I don’t understand your question anyway. Currently it’s set so that staff members won’t be able to do this command. Remove this part if you want staff members to spawn:

           if (c.playerRights != 0) {
           c.sendMessage("Fuck off nigger - You're not authorized enuf to do this");
           return;

If you want only staff members to be able to spawn, change != into ==.[/quote]

lolled ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“erblin, post:7, topic:435824”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=538546.msg3940426#msg3940426 date=1331390308]

Nah i want to allow for all to spawn …

Remove this:

           if (c.playerRights != 0) {
           c.sendMessage("Fuck off nigger - You're not authorized enuf to do this");
           return;

[/quote]

if i remove it when i go compile dont work 100 errors[/quote]

Jeez, your horrible conventions lol.

Remove the } bracket under those three lines.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“erblin, post:3, topic:435824”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=538546.msg3940371#msg3940371 date=1331383280]
Remove the try part of the command.
[/quote]

? how ;A[/quote]

Can you at least try to put more effort into your posts. I’m tired of people typing like “heeeyyy u guyz help me i need gud sever so cn u help me plzzzzz”.

I don’t understand your question anyway. Currently it’s set so that staff members won’t be able to do this command. Remove this part if you want staff members to spawn:

           if (c.playerRights != 0) {
           c.sendMessage("Fuck off nigger - You're not authorized enuf to do this");
           return;

If you want only staff members to be able to spawn, change != into ==.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @erblin erblin
item.description:
@erblin wrote:

hello guys i make this command , and when i try to get ::item with a new player cant do that yh…

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { if (c.playerRights != 0) { c.sendMessage("Fuck off nigger - You're not authorized enuf to do this"); return; } String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 22000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); } } catch(Exception e) {

Read full topic
